summary: App with wallet connect and vault vault-balance UI, including live data fetch from BscScan.
known_issues: Live data fetch from BscScan is not working correctly, causing repeated refresh and Wallet Connect not showing.

existing_features.title: Fix the live vault balance data-fetch/polling so it does not trigger repeated refresh loops and does not prevent the Wallet Connect UI from being shown when needed.
Move the Wallet Connect entry point to the top of the screen so users can always see a Wallet Connect button in the top area (above the hero/content), regardless of balance refresh behavior.
Update the vault balances display to be explicitly token-wise: show a clear list/table where each row is a token label (BNB plus other tokens) with its balance.

new_feature_requests.summary: Move Wallet Connect button to the top of the screen.
Show vault balance token-wise (e.g., BNB and other tokens labeled).

projectName: Stabilize live balance fetching, move Wallet Connect to top, and show token-wise vault balances
